channel.title: Tutorial by Adam Ormsby

item.title: About This Site
item.description: The site you see here is the sample work of a tutorial I wrote on deploying a Hugo site with Github Pages and using git submodules in your project configuration. Follow along at the links below. How to Set Up a Hugo Site on Github Pages - with Git Submodules!
